pull.title: Simplify DisconnectBlock arguments/return value
pull.body: DisconnectBlock currently has a complicated interface which returns a different result based on whether pfClean was passed or not. Change this to return a tristate enum instead. As an added bonus, remove the ValidationState& argument which was unused.

events.message:
Simplify DisconnectBlock arguments/return value

DisconnectBlock currently has a complicated interface:

  Situation       Return value
                  pfClean != nullptr   pfClean == nullptr

  All good:       true                 true
  Failure:        false                false
  Unclean rewind: true                 false
                  with *pfClean=false

Change this to return a tristate enum instead. As an added bonus,
remove the ValidationState& argument which was unused.

events.body:
utACK db994b2de93f52c9e7bed8529ca925de5064a46f, this is much better

Would be nice to add a unit test for these return values at some point
